comment: Smart Data Models - ExcAVR4 adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/ExcAVR4/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Italian excitation system. It represents static exciter and electric voltage regulator.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: imul
contents.comment: AVR output voltage dependency selector (Imul). true = selector is connected false = selector is not connected. Typical Value = true. Default: False

contents.name: ka
contents.comment: AVR gain (K).  Typical Value = 300. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ke
contents.comment: Exciter gain (K).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kif
contents.comment: Exciter internal reactance (K).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: t1
contents.comment: AVR time constant (T).  Typical Value = 4.8. Default: 0

contents.name: t1if
contents.comment: Exciter current feedback time constant (T).  Typical Value = 60. Default: 0

contents.name: t2
contents.comment: AVR time constant (T).  Typical Value = 1.5. Default: 0

contents.name: t3
contents.comment: AVR time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: t4
contents.comment: AVR time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: tif
contents.comment: Exciter current feedback time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: vfmn
contents.comment: Minimum exciter output (V).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vfmx
contents.comment: Maximum exciter output (V).  Typical Value = 5. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vrmn
contents.comment: Maximum AVR output (V).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vrmx
contents.comment: Minimum AVR output (V).  Typical Value = 5. Default: 0.0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
